content.rendered:
We are here with yet another update that was requested the most. In this version, we have added support for multiple testnets for you to integrate and check how the app works.

What’s New:

  • Added support of Polygon Mainnet
  • Added support of Mumbai Testnet (Polygon)
  • Added support of Goerli Testnet (Ethereum)
  • Added support of Sipolia Testnet (Ethereum)

What’s Next:

  • User Wallet Detail screen.
  • Editable and adding new networks.
  • Daily highlights
  • Revamp the landing page.
  • Labeling on current wallet data.
  • Wallet analytics screen.
  • Mainnet support for BSC

Spock needs your feedback to improve more. Visit spockanalytics.xyz and use our free interactable demo and provide us with your feedback at hello@spockanalytics.xyz.
